name: Knock Off
description: You attempt to rid a creature of their held item for the rest of battle. Make a melee attack roll against a target. On a hit, deal 1d10 + MOVE dark damage and any held item of the target disappears. The item appears back in the target's inventory when the battle is over.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
